exercises.title: Verse + Breathing (60s)
exercises.summary: Steady your mind with a one-minute breath and a short KJV verse.
steps: Inhale for 4, hold 4, exhale 4, hold 4 — repeat.
On each exhale, read the verse quietly.

scriptureKJV.text: Be careful for nothing... the peace of God... shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.

exercises.prayer: Lord, steady my mind and guard my heart with Your peace.

exercises.title: Identity-in-Christ Reframe
exercises.summary: Challenge the lie; replace it with Scripture-rooted identity.
steps: Write the troubling thought in one sentence.
Choose one identity verse and craft a 1-sentence reframe.

scriptureKJV.text: Therefore if any man be in Christ, he is a new creature...

exercises.prayer: Father, let me live from who I am in Christ, not from fear.

exercises.title: Confession & Truth Step
exercises.summary: Tell the truth to God and take one concrete act of obedience.
steps: Name one thing to confess in one line.
Receive forgiveness by faith; write a single next step.

scriptureKJV.text: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins...

exercises.prayer: Merciful Lord, I confess honestly. Cleanse me and help me walk in truth.

exercises.title: Serve Someone Today
exercises.summary: Choose one unseen act of love; do it within 24 hours.
steps: Pick one person and one helpful, humble act.
Decide where and when you'll do it (≤24h).
After completion, log how it changed your mood.
exercises.prayer: Jesus, open my eyes to serve with humility and joy.

exercises.title: Scripture Meditation (5m)
exercises.summary: Slow, attentive reading (lectio) to anchor mind and will.
steps: Note one word/phrase that stands out.
Ask: What obedience does this invite today?

scriptureKJV.text: I am the way, the truth, and the life...

exercises.prayer: Speak, Lord; I will listen and obey.
